Designer #masabagupta and Sher Khan #siddharthchaturvedi at an event to judge the gen next designer @viralbhayani
A post shared by Viral Bhayani (@viralbhayani) on Mar 26, 2019 at 10:31pm PDT
title: Siddhant Chaturvedi AKA Gully Boy's MC Sher Grooves On ‘Dilbar’ With Masaba Gupta & It's Lit AF
description: The heartthrob of Bollywood Siddhant Chaturvedi grooved on Nora Fatehi’s Dilbar, the song that is played on almost every club these days. With him was grooving fashion designer Masaba Gupta. And boy, the video is a treat to the eyes. Without further ado, take a look!
